title: What are the best part-time job options for students who can work 2-3 hours a day? - Quora

response.answer_text: If your goal is to make money, take what you can get and don’t be fussy. The importance of a part-time job is that it’s a job. It will have little affect on your future. There are many options: Fast foods, retail sales, tutoring, lawn care, handyman, baby sitting, etc. See if your school has a job board or ask your guidance counselor. Get the job first. You can always get a better one later if need be. Good luck.

If you are 18 years above you can work with Amazon Flex as a delivery associates for 2 hours. Per hour yhey used to provide Rs.120/-. The timing starts from morning 5.30 am itself. 2. If you good in any language you can take home tuitions. 3. If you good in sales you can work in any shops near to your place. 4. If you are good in yoga you can take classes in morning or evening in any gated community apartments. Even you can contact schools also. 5. If you are interested in food industry you can work in any near by restaurant for part time. 6. Even you can do milk delivery also. 7. Morning shifts are available in Big Basket for groceries delivery. So many opportunities are there. You have to.chpose as per your passion. That's it. Anyways congrats dear for your bright future.
